title: President Rajapaksa opens Upper Kothmale Hydro-power Plant Tunnel for the public today
content: Onlanka News – By Janaka Alahapperuma (Pix by: Sudath Silva) President Mahinda Rajapaksa declared open the Upper Kothmale tunnel which is considered to be the longest tunnel in the country this morning (Thursday) on 04 November.
